attributes.action: Let students have a longer Summer Holiday like other countries
attributes.additional_details: Students need to have a longer break from school in order to be ready to learn more the next school year
attributes.background: Students should have a longer Summer Holiday so that if they have lots of family that live in different countries, they would be able to visit them. Also, it gives people a lot more time to do enjoyable things during the Summer Holidays

rejection.details:
The UK Government doesn't set school holiday dates. These are the responsibility of individual schools and local councils. You could raise the issue with your children's schools or with local councillors who represent you. You can find out who your local councillors are, and how to contact them, here:

https://www.gov.uk/find-your-local-councillors
